-tf2._desc: Curious about a Team Fortress 2 character?

_param1._desc: The class you are curious about
A mention to another member in the server, if not specified, I will return your avatar

-gif._desc: I will channel my vast array of knowledge to give you a funny gif and caption

-add._desc: Add a new response or gif to my repository

_param2._desc: If you are adding a gif, just give a link, if you are adding a response, wrap your text in "quotes"

-explode._desc: Go ahead... try it... what do I have to lose?

-ignoreme._desc: I... I understand if you don't want to continue- I’ll stil love you
